title: Map sampler
medium:
Medium: mercerized cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and back stitches on plain weave foundation; fringed on all four sides with a whipped stitch that catches the elements in groups of four. Colored threads added with looping every twelve or sixteen elements.
description: Map of the island of Sicily with principal cities marked, in many colors on a natural ground.
name: Map sampler
